name: Truck Monster
description:
You used to play games of all kinds of gamers. Monster Truck is a type of building protection game with the image and sound alternative, giving the game a new playing style.
How to play: players must use strategy, buy suitable guns and design place where letting guns to destroy all types of enemy that attacks on its territory. If the enemy attacks on the military in the number of the lost, player has to develop another innovative strategy to replay the level.
In each level is a new challenge for players with levels of increasing difficulty.

Let's download the game and conquer every challenge!
